name: Virtual Patch: Houseguest Sim V5.13
description:
Virtual Patch is a short interactive project designed to introduce players to the citizens of Foefurr!  Use your mouse to click on stuff you want to hear about, and hold down the left click to speed up dialogue.  If you are looking at something closely, click on the bottom of the screen to return to the main room.

If you like this game, like reading comics, and want to know more about Katrina and her friends, consider checking out The Dandelion Patch!
